Name: Limiting the time period for parking at parking meters.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the time period for parking at parking meters

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Summary: This bill would limit the maximum time period for parking at parking meters to four hours.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Subchapter 2 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-167.5 to read as follows:
	� 19-167.5 Maximum parking time at parking meters. The maximum time period allowed at a parking space regulated by a parking meter shall be four hours.
	� 2.  This local law takes effect 90 days after it becomes law.





TM/MN
LS 1314
1/11/2018
